Gives access to Bible **Texts,** **version, display, search, pdf** as well as to resources like **Strong_Numbers** and miscellaneous Bible sites. The **refs'** syntax respects *"canon":"ps1:1-3!SG21\@bgw"*.

The workflow is 1.input 2.api 3.iframe

```{ojs}
import {} from "@observablehq/inputs";

// Create an Inputs.text element
viewof userInput = Inputs.text({
  label: "",
  placeholder: "Type here",
  value: "ps1:1-3",
  submit: false,
  width: "10px",
  maxlength: "15" // Set the width to 15 chars
})

// Craft the input value without display
endpoint = "https://jsfapi.netlify.app/.netlify/functions/bgw"
url = endpoint+"?param="+userInput
```

```{ojs}
// Create a button using Inputs.button
viewof myButton = Inputs.button("Show me API!", {value: null, reduce: () => url})
// By default, shows the #clicks here Date
myButton
```

<iframe src="https://jsfapi.netlify.app/.netlify/functions/bgw?param=ps1:1-3!SG21" title="jsfapi iframe" width="400" height="300">

</iframe>
